mapper.select: SELECT cCODE,ID FROM HY_DZ_BorrowOutBack where LEN(cCODE)=10 and cCode>#{cCODE} order by cCODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HY_DZ_BorrowOutBack(ID,cCODE, cType, bObjectCode, cdepcode, ddate, cmemo, cfreight, cMaker, dmDate, cHandler, dVeriDate,csysbarcode,cpersoncode,iStatus,MycdefineT3,iVTID,type_id, iswfcontrolled ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{cCODE}, #{cType}, #{bObjectCode}, #{cdepcode},cast(#{ddate} as datetime), #{cmemo}, #{cfreight}, #{cMaker},cast(#{dmDate} as datetime) , #{cHandler},cast(#{dVeriDate} as datetime), #{csysbarcode}, #{cpersoncode},#{iStatus},#{MycdefineT3},#{iVTID},#{type_id},0 )
